title: about_contents0
description: Subeural is a space that enables the storage of Neural output of Dionisis Pettas. It evolves with it's creator, showcasing thought patterns about kyberphilosophy, existentialism & post-futurism.

title: about_contents1
description: The zero-dimentional point of reference for this space is Curiocity. The rest is mathematics.

title: about_contents2
description: The aesthetics of this space were influenced by Toby Shorin's SubPixel.space. The Insignia/Logo of the space was built upon the showcased in the 61st episode of Mr Freeman, a seried by Vladimir Ponomarev. The influences of it's creator, since bring dynamic, will be discussed in a relative entry.
